ModMetaData.name: Ben Lubar's Android Tiers Patches
ModMetaData.author: Ben Lubar
ModMetaData.description:
A collection of small patches for Android Tiers and related mods.
XML Patches (always active):
- Surrogate androids can be researched as soon as T1 androids are unlocked. Research that comes off of SX androids has been modified to have additional requirements. - You can build the android parts workbench immediately after researching basic robotics, just like the other two workbenches. - Adds a replacement voice synthesizer (in all three tiers of replacement part) for androids. - The Civil Androids and Android Insurrection factions show up properly in the faction list at world generation. - Civil Androids now requires a "classic" ideoligion, the same requirement as Civil Outlander Union. - Android Insurrection now requires a Supremicist Raider ideoligion, and has a Kriminul culture, the same as Pirate Gang. - Simple minded (the trait tier 1 androids have) now blocks Vanilla Social Interactions Expanded inspirations.
Harmony Patches (enabled by default, toggleable in settings):
- Android flesh counts as a space suit for Save Our Ship 2. (Note that this does not prevent frostbite from space.) - Androids cannot get cancer and other human chronic diseases (if another mod tries to give them the disease). - Basic androids cannot be targeted for conversion rituals (default) OR basic androids have the faction's primary ideoligion. - Removes the Recreation need meter from basic androids that don't use it.
Supports, but does not require the following mods:
- Rimworld - Ideology (Official DLC) - Android Tiers - Gynoids Reborn - Save Our Ship 2 - Vanilla Social Interactions Expanded
